content.yext/body: Restaurants Careers Community Stories Events FAQs The Turtlehead Fun Zone How to redeem a gift card You must have some great friends, family or work colleagues if you have a gift card! You can redeem your gift card at any of our restaurants, via a phone order, or online by entering your gift code pin when you enter your payment information. You can also check your gift card balance at turtleheadtacos.com/giftcards .
content.yext/name: How to redeem a gift card
